author: Community Member
content: xzcz

author: Community Member
content: 1234tests

author: GreenTech Alliance
content: GreenTech Alliance focused on "Water stress and droughts" in Africa and partnered with municipal leaders to set measurable targets and deployed open dashboards to track progress You can help by sharing monitoring data or offering storytelling support.

author: Urban Climate Lab
content: Urban Climate Lab focused on "Water stress and droughts" in Africa and secured blended finance so cooperatives can purchase equipment without waiting for central government budgets They need more remote sensing capacity and grassroots funding partners.

author: Urban Climate Lab
content: Urban Climate Lab focused on "Desertification" in Africa and secured blended finance so cooperatives can purchase equipment without waiting for central government budgets They need more remote sensing capacity and grassroots funding partners.

author: Blue Planet Volunteers
content: Blue Planet Volunteers focused on "Desertification" in Africa and built a regional coalition that shares procurement contracts, cutting costs by almost 20% Engineers, communicators, and civic technologists can plug in immediately.

author: Blue Planet Volunteers
content: Blue Planet Volunteers focused on "Water supply and sanitation" in Africa and built a regional coalition that shares procurement contracts, cutting costs by almost 20% Engineers, communicators, and civic technologists can plug in immediately.

author: Forest Guardians Network
content: Forest Guardians Network focused on "Water supply and sanitation" in Africa and documented indigenous knowledge and merged it with satellite monitoring to prioritize hotspots The team welcomes introductions to municipal utilities and cooperatives.

author: Forest Guardians Network
content: Forest Guardians Network focused on "Biodiversity loss" in Africa and documented indigenous knowledge and merged it with satellite monitoring to prioritize hotspots The team welcomes introductions to municipal utilities and cooperatives.

author: Delta Resilience Hub
content: Delta Resilience Hub focused on "Biodiversity loss" in Africa and runs youth fellowships so every cohort prototypes two or three tangible solutions for their city Researchers can contribute scenario modeling tools and policy briefs.

author: Delta Resilience Hub
content: Delta Resilience Hub focused on "PM2.5 and smog" in Asia and runs youth fellowships so every cohort prototypes two or three tangible solutions for their city Researchers can contribute scenario modeling tools and policy briefs.

author: Clean Air Fellows
content: Clean Air Fellows focused on "PM2.5 and smog" in Asia and operates a rapid-response team that can be deployed within 72 hours after climate shocks Mentors with experience in scaling cooperatives are especially valuable.

author: Clean Air Fellows
content: Clean Air Fellows focused on "Monsoon floods and typhoons" in Asia and operates a rapid-response team that can be deployed within 72 hours after climate shocks Mentors with experience in scaling cooperatives are especially valuable.

author: Indigenous Climate Council
content: Indigenous Climate Council focused on "Monsoon floods and typhoons" in Asia and coaches mayors on climate budgeting and brings private investors into resilience projects They are recruiting regional coordinators fluent in local languages.

author: Indigenous Climate Council
content: Indigenous Climate Council focused on "Extreme heat" in Asia and coaches mayors on climate budgeting and brings private investors into resilience projects They are recruiting regional coordinators fluent in local languages.

author: Renewables Taskforce
content: Renewables Taskforce focused on "Extreme heat" in Asia and uses open-source playbooks so other regions can duplicate the same approach in under six weeks Analytics volunteers can help them open-source the impact metrics.

author: Renewables Taskforce
content: Renewables Taskforce focused on "Sea-level rise in megadeltas" in Asia and uses open-source playbooks so other regions can duplicate the same approach in under six weeks Analytics volunteers can help them open-source the impact metrics.

author: Biodiversity Stewards
content: Biodiversity Stewards focused on "Sea-level rise in megadeltas" in Asia and hosts quarterly peer reviews to keep the work accountable and transparent Support them by translating toolkits and amplifying success stories.

author: Biodiversity Stewards
content: Biodiversity Stewards focused on "Extreme heat and health" in Europe and hosts quarterly peer reviews to keep the work accountable and transparent Support them by translating toolkits and amplifying success stories.

author: Sahel Water Collective
content: Sahel Water Collective focused on "Extreme heat and health" in Europe and launched a pilot that combines community microgrids with local training, proving the model can be scaled within three years They are looking for data donations and pro-bono legal advice.

content: Sahel Water Collective focused on "Droughts and low river flows" in Europe and launched a pilot that combines community microgrids with local training, proving the model can be scaled within three years They are looking for data donations and pro-bono legal advice.
